docs.abstract: Dr F L Rosen lr maintains H Wakeham Dec 2 lr, which holds cigarette smoking in airplanes is not detrimental to health of nonsmoker, is fallacious; contends concentrations of smoke that are only mildly annoying to nonsmokers can have serious effects on 'a considerable number of people allergic to tobacco smoke'
